name: REM (Vyntha, PebbleKnight, Kikiimariie, Scr4py, thennediel, Anema)
name_original: REM (Vyntha, PebbleKnight, Kikiimariie, Scr4py, thennediel, Anema)
description:
A nightmare has taken hold of you. Venture through the phases of sleep to escape it - but look out, there's monsters awaiting you at every turn. Collect the shards and find the portal to progress into the next phase.

Best of luck to you.

Programming:

Konstantin Schubert

Kevin Holst

Musik and Sounds:

Paul Gleitsmann

Art:

Annemarie Ollendorf

Alina Rößner

Lara Teegen

Anou Lange

Kiara Marie Ettling

KNOWN BUGS:
• You may not respawn after an enemy kills you (rare).
• The Menu won't show after you win the game.
• The Player will get stuck if you walk into a portal while an enemy kills you.

In both cases just alt+F4 and start over.
